howItWorks.title: How Yemalo Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Discover how Yemalo revolutionizes co-shipping by connecting senders with travelers heading in the same direction. Learn each step and the benefits for both parties.

step1.title: Step 1: Sign Up & Profile
step1.description: Create your account, complete your profile and verify your identity by uploading an ID document. A verified profile builds trust within the community.

step2.title: Step 2: Post or Book
step2.description: Traveler? Post an announcement with your route, date and available kilos. Sender? Browse announcements and submit a booking request specifying the weight you need.

step3.title: Step 3: Exchange & Deliver
step3.description: Once the booking is accepted, chat to arrange the meetup. Hand over the package, confirm pickup and validate delivery with the secure code.

q1.question: How can I track my package?
q1.answer: Once your package is accepted by a traveler, you can track its status through your dashboard. You will receive notifications at each step of the journey.

q2.question: What items are prohibited from shipping?
q2.answer: Prohibited items include hazardous materials, illegal substances, weapons, perishable foods, and items that violate customs regulations. Please check our full list before shipping.

q3.question: How does the payment system work?
q3.answer: We use a secure escrow system. The sender pays when booking, and the payment is held safely until the traveler confirms delivery. This protects both parties.

q4.question: What if my package is damaged or lost?
q4.answer: All shipments are covered by our protection policy. In case of damage or loss, please contact our support team immediately and we will help resolve the issue.

q5.question: How do I become a verified traveler?
q5.answer: To become verified, complete your profile, upload a valid ID document, and pass our verification process. This typically takes 24-48 hours.
